title: Do not disturb settings exceptions always crashes "Settings keeps stopping"
content:
Whenever I go to Sound->Do not Disturb->Exceptions, selecting "Calls" or "Messages, events & reminders" always crashes.  The first time I select either item, I get kicked back to the Sound menu. If I try to go into Do not Disturb->Exceptions and select either item a 2nd time I get the "Settings keep stopping" error message. Settings then force closes and I start all over.
I've sent feedback with system logs. I have tried the following:
1) Restarted the phone, 
2) Cleared data&cache for settings
3) Turn off DND, set Turn on automatically to "Never". I only have the Sleeping and Event Automatic rules defined.
4) Restart in safe mode
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 2
